column1: # STEM = all base pairs in the stem
# INTERIOR LOOP = all nt that are not base paired within the stem
# HAIRPIN LOOP = all nt that are not base paired
# BULGE LEFT / RIGHT = all nt that are unpaired
# MULTI LOOP = all nt that are unpaired
column4: between Stem I and Stem II
column5: between Stem II and Stem III
column6: between Stem III and Stem I

column1: # NT until PK1 = all nt which are in no structure until the first pseudoknot
# NT between PK1 and PK2 = all nt between the first and second pseudoknot
# number of Sequence = number of sequences used for MSA
